headline: CommScope Stockholders Approve CCS Sale
summary: CLAREMONT, N.C., October 16, 2025--CommScope Holding Company, Inc. (NASDAQ: COMM) (the "Company"), a global leader in network connectivity solutions, today announced that the holders of 70% of the Company’s outstanding stock as of the September 8, 2025 record date (with the Company’s common stock and Series A Preferred Stock (on an as converted basis) voting together as a single class) have voted to approve the proposed sale of the Company’s Connectivity and Cable Solutions (CCS) business to Amp

headline: Where Does Amphenol Stand After Its 89% Stock Surge in 2025?
summary: Deciding what to do with Amphenol’s stock right now might feel like standing at a crossroads, looking back at an incredible run and wondering if there is still more road ahead. Over the last year, Amphenol’s share price has surged an astounding 89.0%, with an even bigger 357.9% return over the past five years. Despite a slight dip of 0.2% in the past week, the 5.3% climb over the last month suggests that growth sentiment hasn’t faded. Much of this enthusiasm stems from strong demand for...

headline: A Look at Amphenol’s (APH) Valuation After BofA Upgrade on AI-Driven Demand
summary: Amphenol, a leading provider of fiber-optic cables and connectors, has recently drawn investor attention after BofA Securities upgraded its outlook. The upgrade comes as artificial intelligence continues to drive strong demand for interconnect solutions. See our latest analysis for Amphenol. Amphenol’s latest momentum has caught more eyes after BofA’s upgrade, but the numbers already tell a compelling story. The company’s share price has climbed 82% year-to-date, and the one-year total...

headline: APH's Communications Segment Rides on Strong Portfolio: What's Ahead?
summary: Amphenol surges on booming Communications Solutions sales, major acquisitions and soaring demand from AI and 5G infrastructure.
